WRITING.TEXT: None.

WRITING.TITLE: Starting an eBay store?
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi all,
I am planning on opening an eBay store here in Australia to sell sealed Japanese and English product as well as singles, and I was wondering if anyone on here had some suggestion on what else I should sell (such as mystery power boxes, Japanese sleeves, Japanese pikachu boxes etc...), and if anyone here runs a store themselves, what should I look out for and how should I ship the products to customers?
Thanks
-Joshua

WRITING.TITLE: What to do with an old dell tower server?
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
I found out this place existed because you guys are trending (congrats!), anyways, I have an old dell server tower in my garage that is collecting dust (I used to use it for a Minecraft PE server), so I was wondering if anyone here knew of anything interesting I can do with it?
Thanks -Josh
I once dropped a wooden paintbrush in a bottle of mineral turps, and the paintbrush completely melted.
I might end up going with a hostel to be honest.
I honestly didn't think of that. Thanks :)

WRITING.TITLE: Would you recommend staying only in a Manga kissa while in Japan?
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
I am saving up to go on a holiday to Japan next year for about a week, and I was wondering if anyone here would recommend staying only at a manga kissa while there?
I am asking because it seems to be the cheapest accommodation out there, and I am a poor high school student who can't really afford to stay at a hotel every night.
Thanks
-Joshua

WRITING.TITLE: [AU, WW (preferably AU)] [H] Japanese Moon 066/060 Lillie Full Art Trainer [W] Japanese sealed booster box (specifically phantom gate) + 2 cards from Japanese sun and moon
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
I am wanting to trade my Japanese Lillie full art from collection Moon for a sealed Japanese booster box plus these two cards:
Collection sun:
050/060 Gumshoos GX
Collecion Moon:
028/060 Lunala GX
For the booster box, I am specificity looking for Phantom Gate in Japanese.
If you feel like this is a very one sided trade, I have plenty of English GX from Sun and Moon as well as some EX's from BREAKpoint, BREAKthrough and Evolutions. Feel free to ask what I have available :)
Photos are available on request :)
Thanks
-Joshua
I started collection Japanese recently, and I will **Never** go back to English because of the quality of the cards (The English snorlax pictured is actually my brothers (He collects English)).
